','',item().schema_name,'','.','',item().table_name,'',' 
WHERE ( createdutc > ','''',activity('LKP_max_date').output.firstRow.TheMin,'''',' OR
updatedutc>  ','''',activity('LKP_max_date').output.firstRow.TheMin,'''',' )
and status=1')

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT 1
FROM [dwh].[STG_CUSTOMS_DEC] as SCD
WHERE 
(
try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([NotificationSender], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(datetime, NULLIF([NotificationDate], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([NotificationRef], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([bolNumber], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([declarationNo], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([declarationStatus], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([declarationType], '''')) IS NULL
OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM dwh.STG_CUSTOMS_ITEM AS SCI WHERE sci.declarationNo=SCD.declarationNo)
)
AND [NotificationRef] = ','''',activity('Lookup1').output.firstRow.NotificationRef,'''')

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('select CASE WHEN COUNT(*)=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS LKP from dwh.DWL_CR_TRANSACTION_TYPE T1 INNER JOIN DWH.DWL_ENTITY T2
ON T1.ID_COMPANY_ENTITY=T2.ID_ENTITY_ORG WHERE T1.ID_STATUS=1 AND T2.DS_ENTITY_CR = ','''',activity('LookupColumns').output.value[1],'''')
@concat('select CASE WHEN COUNT(*)=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS LKP from dwh.DWL_COMPANY T1 WHERE T1.DS_CRNUMBER= ','''',activity('LookupColumns').output.value[0].DS_FILENAME,'''')
